unixem_rusage Struct Reference
[Resource Usage API]

#include <unixem/sys/resource.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Resource usage information structure.

Remarks:
This implementation supports only the standard fields ru_utime and ru_stime.

Public Attributes

struct timeval ru_utime
struct timeval ru_stime
char reserved [56]

Member Data Documentation

struct timeval ru_utime [read]

User time used.

Referenced by unixem_getrusage().

struct timeval ru_stime [read]

System time used.

Referenced by unixem_getrusage().
